metadata.title: CVE-2021-3421 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the RPM package in the read functionality. This flawallows an attacker who can convince a victim to install a seeminglyverifiable package or compromise an RPM repository, to cause RPM databasecorruption. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to dataintegrity. This flaw affects RPM versions before 4.17.0-alpha.

criterions.comment: rpm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
